var_Comment: Mycorrhizae. Not developed in compost, from feedstock.
sum of all measured PLFA peaks
All bacteria divided by total fungi (not AM fungi)
0: infinite diversity, 1: no diversity
Shannon(-Wiener) Index, the higher the index, the higher the diversity (>4 seldom found)
bacterivorous/fungivorous nematode groups. Higher values of CI correspond to the higher proportion of energy transformed through the slow fungal decomposition channel
Enrichment index, based on bacterivorous and fungivorous nematode groups and gives an indication of the nutrient availability
Structural index: based on all feeding types except herbivorous group, indication of the functional complexity of the nematode community and maturity of the ecosystem
Compost maturity index based on 4 criteria. Here, 1 criterium (number individuals) is missing: compromised.
